price: die Gärten Edens, in die sie eingehen, durcheilt von Bächen, und in denen sie (alles) haben, was sie wollen. So vergilt (es) Allah den Gottesfürchtigen,
arabic: جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ يَدۡخُلُونَهَا تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَجۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: jannātu ʿadnin yadkhulūnahā tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru lahum fīhā mā yashāūna kadhālika yajzī al-lahu al-mutaqīna
